column3: This change is not macOS specific, so it shouldn't be labelled that way or made to seem that way in the commit message. You're changing how we test for support for a compile flag, which, in this case, is relevant for any OS other than Windows, across both Clang and GCC.\n\nRegardless of the above. What's the underlying cause of the new warnings? What changed that they've only started happening n
